summary.title: German Smart Grid Threat Model (Mid & Low Voltage)
summary.description: Threat model for a German mid- and low-voltage smart grid, compliant with BSI technical requirements and relevant IEC protocols.

diagrams.title: German_Smart_Grid_MidLowVoltage
diagrams.placeholder: Smart grid diagram for mid & low voltage domains

data.name: Mid & Low Voltage Grid
data.description: Trust boundary for the mid- and low-voltage domain.

data.name: Distribution System Operator (DSO)
data.description: Responsible for operating the middle and low voltage distribution grid.

data.name: Energy Supplier
data.description: Supplies energy to the grid and receives consumption data.

data.name: Prosumer
data.description: Consumer with local generation (e.g., rooftop PV).

data.name: Home Energy Management System (HEMS)
data.description: Manages local loads and generation within a smart home.

data.name: Smart Meter
data.description: Records consumption and production data at the customer premises using DLMS/COSEM.

data.name: Remote Terminal Unit (RTU)
data.description: Collects telemetry from grid assets in substations.

data.name: Meter Data Aggregation
data.description: Aggregates meter readings from Smart Meters into a central system.

data.name: Load Forecasting
data.description: Predicts short-term load profiles based on historical data.

data.name: Demand Response Management
data.description: Issues real-time control signals to balance load and generation.

data.name: Voltage Regulation Controller
data.description: Monitors and adjusts voltage levels across feeders.

data.name: Meter Data Store
data.description: Secure database for historical consumption and production records.

data.name: Meter Data
data.description: Smart Meter sends readings securely to aggregation.

data.name: Aggregated Data
data.description: Aggregated data sent to secure store.

data.name: Historical Data Feed
data.description: Meter store provides data for forecasting.

data.name: Forecast Results
data.description: Forecasting output used for demand response.

data.name: Control Signals
data.description: Demand response sends commands to RTU.
